# og-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | The value of the checkbox                          | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Determines, whether the control is disabled or not | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | The label of the checkbox                          | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event     | Description                                | Type                      |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| `changed` | Event is being emitted when value changes. | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |
